message.content:
1. 5% KNO3 and diode laser were used synergistically in Group 3.
2. This combination significantly reduced the DH pain.
3. The DH pain was almost negligible after the 6th week of treatment.
4. 97%–99% of the pain was reported to be relieved after the treatment.
5. Group 3 showed more promising results than any other studied groups.

messages.content:
Statement: Synergistic use of 5% KNO3 and diode laser (Group 3) significantly reduced the DH pain, which was almost negligible after 6th week (97%–99% of the pain was reported to be relieved) and showed promising results than any other studied groups.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
